priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C130271

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered Test Code Terminology

definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy test code.
name: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered Test Code Terminology
synonyms: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Concentrating on doing something for ten minutes?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Concentrating for Ten Minutes

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Remembering to do important things?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Remembering to Do Important Things

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Analysing and finding solutions to problems in day-to-day life?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Finding Solutions to Problems

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Learning a new task, for example, learning how to get to a new place?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Learning a New Task

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Generally understanding what people say?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Understanding What People Say

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Starting and maintaining a conversation?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Starting or Maintaining Conversation

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Standing for long periods such as 30 minutes?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Standing for Long Periods

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Standing up from sitting down?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Standing Up From Sitting Down

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Moving around inside their home?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Moving Around Inside Their Home

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Washing his or her whole body?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Washing His or Her Whole Body

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Getting dressed?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Getting Dressed

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Eating?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Eating

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Staying by himself or herself for a few days?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Staying by Him or Herself a Few Days
synonyms: WD6-Staying by Him/Herself a Few Days

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Dealing with people he or she does not know?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Dealing With People Does Not Know
synonyms: WD6-Dealing With People Does Not Know

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Maintaining a friendship?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Maintaining a Friendship

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Getting along with people who are close to him or her?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Get Along With People Close to Him
synonyms: WD6-Get Along With People Close to Him

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Making new friends?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Making New Friends

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Sexual activities?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Sexual Activities

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Taking care of his or her household responsibilities?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Care of Household Responsibilities

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Doing his or her most important household tasks well?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Doing Important Household Tasks

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Getting all the household work done that is needed?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Getting Household Work Done Needed

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Because of their health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Getting the household work done as quickly as needed?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Getting Household Work Done Quickly

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: His or her day-to-day work/school?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Their Day-to-Day Work or School

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Doing his or her most important work/school tasks well?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Doing Important Work or School Tasks

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Getting all the work done that is needed?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Getting All Work Done You Need
synonyms: WD6-Getting All Work Done You Need

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Getting the work done as quickly as needed?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Getting Work Done Quickly as Needed
synonyms: WD6-Getting Work Done Quickly as Needed

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Participation in society in the past 30 days: How much of a problem did your relative have in joining in community activities (for example, festivities, religious or other activities) in the same way as anyone else can?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Problem Joining Community Activities

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Participation in society in the past 30 days: How much of a problem did your relative have because of barriers or hindrances in the world around him or her?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Problem Because of Barriers in World
synonyms: WD6-Problem Because of Barriers in World

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Participation in society in the past 30 days: How much of a problem did your relative have living with dignity because of the attitudes and actions of others?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Problem Living with Dignity

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Participation in society in the past 30 days: How much time did your relative spend on his or her health condition, or its consequences?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Time Spend on Your Health Condition
synonyms: WD6-Time Spend on Your Health Condition

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Participation in society in the past 30 days: How much has your relative been emotionally affected by his or her health condition?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Emotionally Affected by Health

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Participation in society in the past 30 days: How much has his or her health been a drain on his or her financial resources or on the financial resources of other relatives?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Drain on Financial Resources

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Participation in society in the past 30 days: How much of a problem did you or the rest of his or her family have because of his or her health problems?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Problem Did Your Family Have

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Participation in society in the past 30 days: How much of a problem did your relative have in doing things by himself or herself for relaxation or pleasure?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Problem Doing Things for Relaxation

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - Overall, in the past 30 days, how many days were these difficulties present?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - How Many Days Difficulties Present

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, for how many days was your relative totally unable to carry out his or her usual activities or work because of any health condition?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Days Unable to Carry Out Activities
synonyms: WD6-Days Unable to Carry Out Activities

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, not counting the days that your relative was totally unable, for how many days did your relative cut back or reduce his or her usual activities or work because of any health condition?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - How Many Days Reduce Activities

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - I am the (Fill in the Blank) of this person.
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - I Am (Fill in the Blank) of this Person
synonyms: WD6-I Am (Fill in Blank) of This Person

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Getting out of their home?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Getting Out of Their Home

terms.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 36-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Walking a long distance such as a kilometre [or equivalent]?
terms.preferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 36-item Version Proxy-administered - Walking a Long Distance
